# EntityCanClimbComponent Class

## Extends
- [*EntityComponent*](EntityComponent.md)

When added, this component signifies that the entity can climb up ladders.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:can_climb";`

Type: *string*
